name: SD Gundam Gaiden: Knight Gundam Monogatari
overview: SD Gundam Gaiden: Knight Gundam Monogatari is a role-playing game based around the SD Gundam Gaiden Sieg Zion Hen project. The anime series which this game is based on reimagines the original Gundam characters as medieval tropes such as knights and wizards. Gameplay is similar to games in the Dragon Quest series.
